content: वधः {@--1@} Killing, murder, slaughter, destruction; आत्मनो वधमाहर्ता क्वासौ विहगतस्करः <ls>V. 5. 1</ls>; मनुष्यवधः homicide; पशुवधः &c. {@--2@} A blow, stroke. {@--3@} Paralysis. {@--4@} Disappearance. {@--5@} Multiplication (in math.). {@--6@} A killer, slayer. {@--7@} A vanquisher, victor. {@--8@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A deadly weapon, such as Indra's thunderbolt.
